Role_Desc: Person at the ECU supplier who is responsible for managing keys at the supplier side for the related ECU project. Eg storing the ECU private key into the Key Management System (KMS) at the supplier. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive Supplier, Development ENHANCED, Production, After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Own ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_supplier_FR: Functional role request for ECU Supplier - Development
User_Example: Production,After-Sales BASIC,EPTI(Electronical Periodical Technical Inspection),TCU(Telemetics Control Unit),After-Sales ENHANCED,After-Sales STANDARD
